text:
DoubleMap | http://www.doublemap.com/ | REMOTE | FULL-TIME

Python web application developer

Are you fascinated by the logistics behind Uber and Lyft? Join us as we bring on-demand transit to public transit agencies across the country.

We're a small, fast-moving company working on bringing technology to public transit. Our server code is all in Flask, so experience making web applications with Python is a must. Bonus points for Angular and experience.

Interested? Email your resume and a short description of what you are looking for to careers@doublemap.com
